originalText.text: We invited Ajna Dance Company to perform at our wedding reception. We had 5 dancers. The group arrived ahead of time and were friendly. Their performances were excellent. We had 2 dance medleys with each medley lasting 8-10 minutes. Within each medley, the dancers performed to 4-5 Hindi songs. Their dancing was amazing. It was well choreographed and well synchronized! My wife and I and our guests enjoyed their dance performances. The Hindi songs were popular, well-known songs. I would highly recommend Ajna Dance Company to your event as they are so fun and will help take your event to the next level.

originalText.text: Ajna Dance Studio is an amazing organization!  They adapted their workshops for our virtual classrooms and our students are still abuzz with excitement!

text.text: Ajna Dance Studio is an amazing organization!  They adapted their workshops for our virtual classrooms and our students are still abuzz with excitement!

originalText.text: We are so very grateful to the Ajna Dance Company for their FANTASTIC large group assembly performance and lessons that were given to our K-2nd grade students!! They are engaging and exciting educators and performers. It was so much fun to participate and watch all the young  children in their homes joyfully learning the dances and watching the performances. Simply amazing!!!  Thank you so so much!

Simply amazing!!!  Thank you so so much!

originalText.text: Ajna Dance conducted 2 assemblies celebrating Holi for our over 600 students in Pre-K - 5th grades.  The assembly consisted of the history of various types of Indian Dances followed by a demonstration of each dance.  Students and staff were fascinated during the performances. Ajna made it all come to life even more when they asked for audience participation.  The students and staff both equally enjoyed all aspects of the assembly and are looking forward to others.  Ajna staff members are friendly, polite, knowledgable, engaging, and professional.  We will definitely book Ajna Dance for future assemblies and possible residencies as we continue to celebrate and embrace all cultures.

originalText.text: We love when the  Ajna dance Company performs for The International Preschools. This year we were hesitant about not having the company perform live but the virtual performance was engaging, age appropriate and enjoyable for the children as well as the staff!
